class_notes: This class will meet in person T/Th, with asynchronous materials to be completed on Fridays.
course_description: Students will continue to develop their skills in Chinese by reading, discussing, and writing about topics in contemporary China. They will also practice formulating and expressing their ideas in Chinese. Students will develop an enriched understanding of traditions in Chinese culture and society.
sections: Class Nbr: 2097, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TThF 4-4:50p, Instructor: Y. Xu, Status: Open
